ygData.subject: Re: Expansion Spells (Unconfirmed)
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree... why do we need other tap spells when we have lifeleech? banshee aura at that lvl will be nearly useless I think, unless it gets an upgrade. 8 dmg
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree... why do we need other tap spells when we have lifeleech?

banshee aura at that lvl will be nearly useless I think, unless it gets an
upgrade. 8 dmg per hit to a lvl 50+ mob?

another undead lull? please.

another undead fear? see above

more pets? yay more fodder that cost too much mana

leave nullify magic to the casters

steelskin and expel undead i like a lot. VC is cool too, as is BB.

i'ts ok i guess, but could be a lot better
